short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension to help credit your flights

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Credit My Flights is a handy Chrome extension for savvy travelers looking to maximize their frequent flyer points. When booking or researching flights, this tool provides valuable information on points multipliers and cabin bonuses when crediting your flight to partner airlines.

Key features:
-Instantly displays crediting options for 21 major airlines
-Shows points multipliers and cabin bonuses for each partner
-Helps you make informed decisions to optimize your mileage earning

Whether you're an occasional flyer or a points enthusiast, Credit My Flights simplifies the process of choosing the best frequent flyer program for each trip. Make every flight count towards your next reward!
